-----Original Message-----
From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 12:03 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Screaming Terror

Screaming Terror is a great spell for dungeons when you pull more npcs then
you want. It is a fear spell but it also wipes the agro list from the npc
that way it won't come back.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 33rd Circle
